feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: W 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
